Tehran: A map of military bases and strategic sites struck by Israel
description: For 12 days, starting on June 13, the Iranian capital was attacked with a wave of air strikes conducted by the Israeli army. As well as military targets, several residential buildings belonging to key regime figures and scientists were struck.

At least 13 are dead and 20 are missing in Texas flash flood
description: More than 20 girls at a summer camp in South-Central Texas remain unaccounted for after devastating floods swept through the region Northwest of San Antonio: 'The rain has let up, but we know there's another wave coming.'

headline: Arrest warrant dropped against Bosnian Serb leader, wanted over accusations of 'attacking the constitutional order'
description: Milorad Dodik has been wanted since March by the Bosnian authorities for banning the central police and judiciary − a move deemed secessionist by prosecutors.

headline: 'The ideological fusion between the American right and the media did not start with Trump, but he accelerated it'
description: The academic Marlène Laruelle explains how, from the radio stations during the Reagan era to today's online algorithms, the American radical right has methodically built a diverse media ecosystem.

headline: In France, asylum seekers navigate labyrinth of Europe's Dublin Regulation
description: '2015-2025: Europe's migration crisis' (3/5). In the 1990s, the European Union established the Dublin Regulation, aiming to prevent asylum seekers from filing applications in multiple countries. The massive influx of refugees over the past 10 years has shattered the system, which is no longer implemented in all EU member states.

France's greenhouse gas emissions stopped declining in the first quarter of 2025
description: Carbon emission rates stayed almost flat (+0.2%) from January to March and are set to drop by only 0.8% over 2025, according to the CITEPA nonprofit tasked with calculating emissions. This pace falls far short of climate targets.

headline: Trump flexes political muscle with passage of ‘big and beautiful’ budget
description: The 'One Big Beautiful Bill' allocates an enormous $165 billion for the effort to deport undocumented migrants, introduces tax cuts benefiting the wealthiest Americans and enacts drastic cuts to Medicaid healthcare coverage. Experts warn that the bill is likely to deepen the US national debt to alarming levels.

headline: Global economy braces for Trump's trade war and its consequences
description: After three months of tumultuous negotiations, the US is preparing to unveil trade agreements with its main partner countries by July 9. But the announcement of tariff hikes, followed by numerous reversals, has already begun to undermine the foundations of global growth.
